name: Asian Shrimp Stir-fry
preparation: Whisk first 4 ingredients in a bowl. Add shrimp, cover, and marinate in refrigerator for at least 30 minutes
Place a Wok or frying pan over medium-high heat, and add oil.
Add shrimp and marinade and flash fry for 2–3 minutes. Add onion and pineapple and toss to combine. Continue cooking for 2–3 minutes and serve warm.

summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.
